Comments_List: I learned basic French grammar and vocabulary. By the end of the course, I had a small amount of conversational fluency.
I have gone from zero French knowledge to a modest level of proficiency in understanding written and some spoken French.

The immersive experience was definitely a strength of this course, however I would appreciate if the curriculum paid more attention to explaining relevant grammatical structures as they come up instead of just teaching students how to use the grammar in practice.
Yes! Learning French has been incredibly rewarding - this was my best class this semester. This course has inspired me to continue studying French and to begin a second foreign language.
